name: skribblDesktop
description:
This is an unofficial client for the web-based game skribbl.io!

Enjoy the online-multiplayer drawing fun with your friends, and finally, with a standalone desktop app for Linux and Windows!

Important: If you are trying to join a lobby made by another person, copy the link with Ctrl+C, click the app window to have it focused, and press Ctrl+V. It automatically redirects the page to the lobby. Now you can start customizing  your player (and you end up joining the lobby)

Have fun drawing!
